scripts.prod: cp config/firebase-adminsdk-sample.json config/firebase-adminsdk.json && cp config/firebaseAdminDatabaseUrl-sample.js config/firebaseAdminDatabaseUrl.js && cp public/config/firebaseConfig-sample.js public/config/firebaseConfig.js
scripts.dev: cp config/firebase-adminsdk-dev-sample.json config/firebase-adminsdk.json && cp config/firebaseAdminDatabaseUrl-dev-sample.js config/firebaseAdminDatabaseUrl.js && cp public/config/firebaseConfig-dev-sample.js public/config/firebaseConfig.js
scripts.rel: cp config/firebase-adminsdk-rel-sample.json config/firebase-adminsdk.json && cp config/firebaseAdminDatabaseUrl-rel-sample.js config/firebaseAdminDatabaseUrl.js && cp public/config/firebaseConfig-rel-sample.js public/config/firebaseConfig.js
